content:
During February 6 in the Kherson region, the army of the Russian Federation applied 42 FPV-aroma and dropped 47 fragmental ammunition from UAV of various modifications.

About thisreportedDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

It is noted that yesterday the occupiers 24 times mercilessly drew from artillery to the center and the suburbs of Kherson.

Also under hostile shellings were Lviv, Chernobayivka, Mikhailivka, Tyaginka, engineering, gold beam, Annunciation, Belozerka, Odradokamanka, Ivanivka, Antonovka, Giant, Zniivka, Sadiov, Kizomis, Broad Balka, and Territis. Kutsurub communities in Mykolaiv region.

As a result of artillery shelling, 2 civilians were injured. In addition, the building of the art museum, the port infrastructure, a dozen high -rise buildings, private homes, 6 civilian cars, power lines and gas pipelines were damaged.

As reported by the Armyinform, as a result of a blow to Kharkiv regiondiedThe pensioner and three children were injured.
title: During the attacks in Kherson region, the occupiers per day used more
description: This was reported by the defense forces of southern Ukraine. It is noted that yesterday the occupiers 24 times ...
author: Army Inform
